name: Magic Item Values by Rarity
guidance: Rarity helps set prices if magic items can be bought or sold in your campaign.
Common items can be found in towns; rarer items are found in cities or wondrous locales.
Add the cost of any nonmagical base item to the magic item's value when applicable.
Halve the value for consumables other than spell scrolls; spell scroll value is double its scribing cost.
